sen.j: 藤原蔵下麻呂（ふじわらのくらじまろ 天平6年（734年） - 宝亀6年7月1日 (旧暦)（775年8月5日））は奈良時代の貴族。
sen.e: FUJIWARA no Kurajimaro (734 - 5 August 775) was a noble in the Nara Period.
FUJIWARA no Kurajimaro (734 - 5 August 775) was a noble in the Nara Period.
FUJIWARA no Kurajimaro (734 - 5 August 775) was a noble in the Nara Period.
sen.cmt: 5 August 775→August 5, 775の統一表現にしました。

sen.j: 藤原式家の出身。
sen.e: He was from a sub branch of Fujiwara family.
He was from Fujiwara Shikike (a sub branch of Fujiwara family).
sen.cmt: 「a sub branch of Fujiwara family」は、補足のような句なので、『Fujiwara Shikike』を追加しました。
sen.e: He was from Fujiwara Shikike (a sub branch of Fujiwara family).

sen.j: 藤原宇合の第9子。
sen.e: He was the ninth child of FUJIWARA no Umakai.
He was the ninth child of FUJIWARA no Umakai.
He was the ninth child of FUJIWARA no Umakai.

sen.j: 従三位・参議。
sen.e: His title was Jusanmi (Junior Third Rank) Councilor.
His title was Jusanmi (Junior Third Rank) Councilor.
His title was Jusanmi (Junior Third Rank) Councilor.

sen.j: 舍人となり、出雲国介に移る。
sen.e: He became a palace servant and moved to Izumo Province.
He became a palace servant and moved to Izumo Province.
He became a palace servant and moved to Izumo Province.

sen.j: 天平宝字7年（763年）従五位下を授かり、少納言に任じられた。
sen.e: He was promoted to Junior Fifth Rank in 763 and given the tite of Shonagon.
He was promoted to Junior Fifth Rank in 763 and given the title of Shonagon.
He was promoted to Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade) in 763 and given the title of Shonagon (lesser councilor of state).
sen.cmt: Shonagon (lesser councilor of state)としました。Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade)としました。

sen.j: 天平宝字8年（764年）備前国国司となる。
sen.e: In 764, he became a provincial governor in Bizen Province.
In 764, he became a provincial governor in Bizen Province.
In 764, he became a provincial governor in Bizen Province.

sen.j: 天平宝字8年（764年）9月、藤原仲麻呂が乱を起こし、賊軍は近江国へ走った。
sen.e: In September, 764, FUJIWARA no Nakamaro started the war, and the rebel army headed to Omi Province.
In 764, FUJIWARA no Nakamaro started the war, and the rebel army headed to Omi Province.
sen.cmt: 「天平宝字8年（764年）9月」が西暦764年9月であるかは、和文上では判断できないので「September」は削除しました。
sen.e: In October 764, FUJIWARA no Nakamaro started the war, and the rebel army headed to Omi Province.
sen.cmt: グレゴリオ歴で10月なので補足しました。

sen.j: 官軍はこれを追討、蔵下麻呂は討賊将軍に任じられ将兵を率いて援軍として参じ、力戦してこれを破った。（藤原仲麻呂の乱）
sen.e: Although the Imperial Army defeated the rebels, FUJIWARA no Kurajimaro as commander-in-chief led reinforcements and defeated the Imperial Army (FUJUWARA no Nakamaro's War).

As the Imperial Army tracked down and disposed of the rebel army, FUJIWARA no Kurajimaro was appointed as a commander-in-chief of the punitive force against the rebels and led his soldiers to take part in the war as a reinforcement and defeated the rebel army. (FUJUWARA no Nakamaro's War)
sen.cmt: 翻訳者の訳と解釈が全く違います。
sen.e: As the Imperial Army tracked down and disposed of the rebel army, FUJIWARA no Kurajimaro was appointed as a commander-in-chief of the punitive force against the rebels and led his soldiers to take part in the war as a reinforcement and defeated the rebel army (FUJUWARA no Nakamaro's War).
sen.cmt: ピリオドの位置を修正しました。

sen.j: この功績により従三位を授かる。
sen.e: He received the rank of Jusanmi (Junior Third Rank).
For the achievement, he received the rank of Jusanmi (Junior Third Rank).
For the achievement, he received the rank of Jusanmi.
sen.cmt: (Junior Third Rank)は既出のため削除しました。

sen.j: 同年10月、廃位された淳仁天皇（淡路廃帝）を配所へ護送した。
sen.e: In October of the same year, he escorted the Emperor Junnin who was dethroned (Dethroned Emperor of Awaji) to the place of exile.
A month later, he escorted the Emperor Junnin who was dethroned (Dethroned Emperor of Awaji) to the place of exile.
sen.cmt: 同年10月とは、「天平宝字8年」のことであり、西暦764年での記載がないため、和文上では判断出来かねますので『その一ヶ月後』と解釈し『A month later』を追加しました。
sen.e: In November 764, he escorted the Emperor Junnin who was dethroned (Dethroned Emperor of Awaji) to the place of exile.
sen.cmt: グレゴリオ歴で764年11月なので補足しました。

sen.j: 天平神護元年（764年）近衛府となる。
sen.e: In 764, he became an inner palace guard.
In 764, he became an inner palace guard.
In 764, he became an inner palace guard.

sen.j: 神護景雲元年（767年）伊予国土佐国二国按察使となる。
sen.e: In 767, he became an inspector for Iyo Province and Tosa Province.
In 767, he became an inspector for Iyo Province and Tosa Province.
In 767, he became an inspector for Iyo Province and Tosa Province.

sen.j: 宝亀元年（770年）称徳天皇が崩御すると、左大臣・藤原永手らとともに白壁王を即位させる（光仁天皇）。
sen.e: In 770, after the death of Empress Shotoku, Prince Shirakabe (Emperor Konin) was enthroned with help from Kurajimaro and Sadaijin (Minister of the Left) FUJIWARA no Nagate.
After the death of Empress Shotoku in 770, Kurajimaro enthroned Prince Shirakabe (Emperor Konin) with Sadaijin (Minister of the Left) FUJIWARA no Nagate.
sen.cmt: 「蔵下麻呂」を主語にし、文章を能動態の形に修正しました。
sen.e: After the death of Empress Shotoku in 770, Kurajimaro enthroned Prince Shirakabe (Emperor Konin) with Sadaijin (Minister of the Left) FUJIWARA no Nagate.

sen.j: 同年、兵部省を兼ねる。
sen.e: In the same year, he held the concurrent position in Hyobusho (Ministry of Military).
In the same year, he held the concurrent position in Hyobusho (Ministry of Military).
In the same year, he held the concurrent position in Hyobusho (Ministry of Military).

sen.j: 宝亀2年（771年）皇太子となった他戸親王の春宮大夫となる。
sen.e: In 771, he became Togu Daibu of the Imperial Prince Osabe.
In 771, he became Togu Daibu of Imperial Prince Osabe.
In 771, he became Togu Daibu of Imperial Prince Osabe.

sen.j: しかし、宝亀3年（772年）井上内親王が天皇を呪詛した事件により、他戸皇太子は廃されてしまった。
sen.e: However, in 772, Prince Osabe lost his power due to an incident which was caused by the Imperial Princess Inoe putting a curse on the emperor.
However, in 772, Prince Osabe lost his power due to an incident which was caused by the Imperial Princess Inoe putting a curse on the emperor.
However, in 772, Prince Osabe lost his power due to an incident which was caused by the Imperial Princess Inoe putting a curse on the emperor.

sen.j: 宝亀5年（774年）兵部卿から大宰帥となる。
sen.e: In 774, he was transferred from the Minister for Military Affairs to Dazai no sochi.
In 774, he was transferred from the Minister for Military Affairs to Dazai no sochi.
In 774, he was transferred from the Minister for Military Affairs to Dazai no sochi.

sen.j: 同年、参議となる。
sen.e: He became the Councilor later in the same year.
In that year, he became Sangi (councillor).
sen.cmt: 「later」を削除し、『Sangi』を追加。「in the same year」を『In that year』に変更し文頭にしました。
sen.e: In that year, he became Sangi (councillor).

sen.j: 宝亀6年（775年）死去。
sen.e: He died in 775.
He died in 775.
He died in 775.
